description.narrative:
Goal: Marginalized youth have a decent income to take care of themselves and possible children or younger siblings.
SKILLS - marginalized youth have sufficient skills to become selfemployed: 480 trained marginalized youth, 160 will be trained as IT specialists of which 80 % will be (self)employed within 6 months after finishing training. , 140 will be trained in basic IT skills, who will need additional training to become employed.
QUALITY - improved quality of training and accreditation ensures financial sustainability of Nairobits, allowing to continue supporting marginalized youth: 80 % of students pass assessment after finishing 3 month internship 10% more paying students and 2 new donors by end of 2019 Quality improvement trajectory on quality of internship, accreditation and track and trace finalized: outcome of quality improvement trajectory is positively assessed by Nairobits, Edukans Kenya, graduates and workplace supervisors. 40 workplace supervisors trained on pedagogical and didactical skills Assessment sheets (website development) is developed. Training is accredited Questionnaire developed and used for 25 % of the trained youth

title.narrative: Education providers continuously improve quality and relevance of education through a safe and enabling environment, the use of skills to monitor and promote quality education and 7-steps to WORK and through the establishment of active partnerships

description.narrative: Education providers continuously improve quality and relevance of education through a safe and enabling environment, the use of skills to monitor and promote quality education and 7-steps to WORK and through the establishment of active partnerships

title.narrative: Number of training providers continuously improve their training

description.narrative: TVET's improved on quality scale of the 7-steps model/TVETS successfully completed the 7-steps model

title.narrative: Education providers supported and capacitated to establish relationships with relevant key stakeholders and to apply 7-steps to WORK

description.narrative: Education providers supported and capacitated to establish relationships with relevant key stakeholders and to apply 7-steps to WORK

Education providers are supported in conducting a labour market analysis, identify most market relevant vocations and link with potential employers for internships or job placements. Support could consist of 7-steps to WORK training provided to TVET trainers.

title.narrative: Teachers trained in Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

description.narrative: Teachers trained in Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

title.narrative: Trainers trained in Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

description.narrative: Trainers trained in Edukans methods (ATL, CSE, SEL, Life skills, GRP)

This indicator refers to the number of trainers that completed one or more Edukans training(s) on Active Teaching & Learning, Comprehensive Sexuality Education, Social & Emotional Learning, Lifeskills and/or Gender Responsive Pedagogy

title.narrative: Young people have decent income through (self) employment

description.narrative: Young people have decent income through (self) employment

title.narrative: Number of young people with decent income through (self) employment

description.narrative: Edukans wants marginalised youth to get (self) employed in order to finally develop a sustainable livelihood. This is achieved through (technical) vocational training and Life skills training. The training helps youngsters to be professional in obtaining and keeping a job or start their own business

title.narrative: % of youth that completed vocational education

description.narrative: The percentage of youth that completed vocational education out of all youth that received vocational education in an Edukans project. This indicator is an indication for the quality of education. In addition, drop-out could be estimated using the completion rates.

title.narrative: Youth stating to be (self)employed 6 months after completing training

description.narrative: Youth stating to be (self)employed 6 months after completing training

title.narrative: Number of youth stating to be (self)employed 6 months after completing training
